bug.author: ndeshp2s
bug.description: Hello all. I have been using carla for a few months now. However, today I encountered a strange situation. I formatted my laptop and after formatting carla does not seem to work on my system any more. After a lot of debugging I encountered the issue is when I try to call get_world() method. It gives segmentation fault. Any idea why?

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ndeshp2s>@ndeshp2s</denchmark-link> , Can you provide any log? Are you working with the package version of Carla or you compile Carla yourself?

I´m getting the same error, stacktrace is the same like in: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/2079>#2079</denchmark-link>
I´m compiling CarlaLib myself following the instructions for the c++ client on this page: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/tree/master/Examples/CppClient>https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/tree/master/Examples/CppClient</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ndeshp2s>@ndeshp2s</denchmark-link> we are going to need way more information to help you with this...Please, be verbose. Tell us about your system, etc.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
